TextView.android:text: This is remedy of lymphatic temperament. It is chiefly used in ointments, lotions, compress and bath.Internally it is used for angina pectoris, asthma, cephalgia, colic at the periods, cold tumours, congestion and hardening of the glands, creeping sensation in the skin with pruritis and desquamation, fistula [dental], gastric debility, general debility, glandular enlargement with induration, goiter, gout, muscular weakness, polyps, prostate fluids, rheumatic fever, skin diseases, vertigo, toothache, testicles, hyperthyroidism.

•Immune related disorder •Connective tissue remedy as well as Glandular Remedy •L1 influenced lymph and blood as well as upon muscles and articular surface. •Muscular and joint disease, myoasthenia, muscular weakness, gout, rheumatism, dislocation and disfigurement of joints. •Acts on blood cells, dyscrasia of blood as in anemia, leucosis. •Maintain in the count of WBC and RBC. •Inflammatory lesions of skin with other specific remedies of Sand C. •+ ve dill stimulates secretion of cutaneous glandular secretions, and higher dill decrease the same. •Hyperactivity of sweat glands, excessive sweating, dryness of skin, •Dermatitis, dry or moist eczema, psoriasis, scabies. •Joint and muscles, uric acid, gout or rheumatism. •Amnesia, dementia, chorea, epilepsy, hysteria.

 remedy for obesity and non-toxic goiter. Acidity, oesophagic reflux, hiatus hernia, pyrosis, nourishing, obstinate constipation, thyroid enlargement in obese subjects, anti-scurvy, poultice is used in cellulitis, wrinkle, skin flaccidity.
